co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler

Interface IAdvancedModRegister

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModRegister
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModRegister

    public interface IAdvancedModRegister
extends IModRegister
    Interface for advanced mod registers that need access to things like dependencies of ASM.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler.IModRegister

        isUsingAnnotation

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerAnnotationHandlers()
      Where you add annotation handlers.
      void registerDependencies()
      Where you add dependencies with DependenciesRegistry.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler.IModRegister

    • Method Detail

      • registerTransformers

        void registerTransformers()
        Where you register transformers. This is called BEFORE everything else, in Bootstrap. DO NOT USE TO REGISTER BLOCKS!

      • registerDependencies

        void registerDependencies()
        Where you add dependencies with DependenciesRegistry. Example: DependenciesRegistry.addDependency(this, "NIADEL_example_mod");

      • registerAnnotationHandlers

        void registerAnnotationHandlers()
        Where you add annotation handlers.
